CustomField.description: If multiple complainers entered, the formula return true. Possible complainers are fields on case and possibilities are Client, Contractor, Third Party or Institution
CustomField.formula: OR( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( AccountId ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerContractor__c ) ) ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( AccountId ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( InstitutionType__c ) ) ) ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( AccountId ) ), OR( NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerLastName__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerFirstName__c ) ) ) ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerContractor__c ) ), OR( NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerLastName__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerFirstName__c ) ) ) ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( InstitutionType__c ) ) ), OR( NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerLastName__c ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerFirstName__c ) ) ) ), AND( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( InstitutionType__c ) ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( ComplainerContractor__c ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Multiple Complainers
